pullRequest.title: Use DevTools service in performance action and delete manager
pullRequest.bodyText: This replaces the open DevTools action in the performance tab and allows us to fully delete DevToolsManager.

commit.message: Use DevTools service in performance action and delete manager

nodes.bodyText: we should actually move the getProject().isDisposed() checks above logging errors here and elsewhere. If your project has been disposed we don't need to scare the user with an error likely due to the project being closed.

commit.message: Check for project disposal before logging
